# ðŸŒ¹ @sharyn/util

Lodash-like utils.

## Installation

```sh
npm i @sharyn/util
# or
yarn add @sharyn/util
```

You can alternatively install the entire [**sharyn**](https://github.com/sharynjs/sharyn#getting-started) library.

- [**toggle**](https://github.com/sharynjs/sharyn/tree/master/packages/util.toggle/README.md#readme) â€“ Toggles between two values
